This glossary provides definitions for common abbreviations used throughout the APSIM NG documentation.  

It helps ensure clarity and consistency for all readers and contributors.


## Common Abbreviations

| Abbreviation | Meaning                  | Notes                            |
|--------------|--------------------------|----------------------------------|

| PP           | Photoperiod              | Day length influencing development in phenology |

## Usage Notes

- Please refer to this glossary before introducing new abbreviations to maintain consistency.
- When writing documentation or code comments, spell out abbreviations on first use followed by the abbreviation in parentheses, e.g., _Photoperiod (Pp)_.
- This glossary will be updated as the APSIM NG project evolves.
